top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

comments_since_last_sample.body: Her houses get bigger and bigger lol,so proud of her
Those computers in the office not even plugged in. I know it looks cleaner, but functional is good too
WHERE DO YOU GET THE MONEY

i am so proud of Ro. i remember watching her videos religiously as a kid but in all honesty i don't watch her anymore. but regardless, i always come for her house tour videos. oh my days, i couldn't think it could get any better! man i'm still obsessing over her last house 😆 but anyways, wow! congrats angel!❣
Love your style, so inspiring! Love your dress too! Whose the designer? 💗

The house is super amazing and spectacular. Congratulations 🍾 If this was my house the only thing that I will change is the black doors for all the rooms, the house is so natural so I feel the black doors are little harsh!

Lol
I’m a housecleaner can I maintain your home . Love the home 🏡
Coffee machine looks like a Kendra !
I will forever be jealous of Ro 😭😭 but I am so happy for her!! I do feel like I have lived in her kitchen for 10 years though.
your home is beautiful , very well designed !
